trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: A Bezier spline does not pass through its control points. The control points act as magnets, pulling the curve in certain directions to influence the way the spline bends.

seg-source.mrk: A Bezier spline does not pass through its control points.
The control points act as magnets, pulling the curve in certain directions to influence the way the spline bends.

target.mrk: A Bezier spline does not pass through its control points.
The control points act as magnets, pulling the curve in certain directions to influence the way the spline bends.
